name: The Tale of (Your Name)
description:
Embark on an exploration through a procedurally generated dungeon, brimming with ferocious monsters, perilous traps, and challenging puzzles. Dive into a distinctive 2D roguelike shooter experience, where each game unfolds as a unique journey.

In "The Tale of (Your Name)," take control of a character's role in a tabletop RPG setting, shaping their attributes and narrative. Collaborate with a group of friends to craft an epic medieval fantasy tale, featuring a protagonist armed with weapons ahead of their time.

Select your hero from three remarkable adventurers, each endowed with unique abilities, and set out on a journey filled with perils and discoveries. Venturing through a dungeon fraught with monsters, traps, and puzzles, your objective in each room is to locate a key to progress to the next challenge. As you advance, encounter narrative events that unfold your story—make critical choices in these events to proceed, decisions that might lead to wealth or pit you against a formidable monster.

Progressing through the dungeon, utilize your accumulated wealth to purchase and enhance your weaponry (yes, firearms in this setting—thanks to the campaign master's whimsy), as well as other resources.

Prepare for an exhilarating journey where, with each move, a new chapter emerges, and the fate of the protagonist rests in your hands. In "The Tale of (Your Name)," your unwritten story awaits. Confront challenges, make strategic choices, and become the unforgettable hero or villain of this captivating tale.
